alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 11:00AM CDT until June 18 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1145 AM CDT. * At 1059 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Increase to 4 miles west of Clara, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Butler, Chatom, Saint Stephens, Lisman, Millry, Silas, Coffeeville, Pennington, Gilbertown and Toxey. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
